title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; simple API for chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use local models as LLMs, embedders, or tool-calling agents inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; manage models and chat in the browser with markdown, code highlighting, and dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and delete models from JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic Ruby API to chat and generate with local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline code-completion Copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production-ready RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama; supports chat, generate, and streaming via REST.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose files for running Ollama server and web-ui containers with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selectors and persistent storage.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models; features conversation threads and model switcher.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; async client for chat, generate, pull, and delete with tokio support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; chat and generate with strong typing and streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; slash commands and conversation threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; mentions trigger local model replies with configurable system prompts.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to Ollama REST API; 100% TypeScript.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama; install with pip and chat/generate/embed in Python scripts.
